section.name: abonentinfo
section.param: Абонент $$string import="abonent"$$: статус $$string import="status"$$, msc $$string import="msc"$$
Abonent $$string import="abonent"$$: status $$int32 import="status"$$, encoding $$int32 import="encoding"$$, msc $$string import="msc"$$

section.name: profiler
section.param: Message character encoding is set to default encoding (now you are not able to receive messages with russian characters in the text even if your cell phone supports ucs2 messages)
You have no priveledges to modify your profile
Message character encoding is set to ucs2 encoding (now you will be able to receive messages with russian characters in the case your cell phone supports ucs2 messages)

section.name: reason
section.param: ESME Receiver Temporary App Error Code
ESME Receiver Permanent App Error Code
ESME Receiver Reject Message Error Code
Error in the optional part of the PDU Body
Incorrect BIND Status for given command
Predefined Message Invalid or Not Found

section.name: default
section.param: #Сообщение на $$string import="dest"$$ от $$date pattern="dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss" import="date"$$ удалено
*Your message sent to $$string import="dest"$$ was successfully delivered on $$date pattern="dd MMMM yyyy, HH:mm:ss" import="date"$$

*Message to $$string import="dest"$$ sent on $$date pattern="dd MMMM yyyy, HH:mm:ss" import="date"$$ failed: $$string import="reason"$$. Resend the message to $$string import="dest"$$ once again and maybe you will have luck next time. Sincerely, smsc sme.
$Сообщение на $$string import="dest"$$ от $$date pattern="dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss" import="date"$$ обломалось: $$string import="reason"$$

section.name: special
section.param: #=Сообщение на $$string import="dest"$$ от $$date pattern="dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss" import="date"$$ удалено
*=Your message sent to $$string import="dest"$$ was successfully delivered on $$date pattern="dd MMMM yyyy, HH:mm:ss" import="date"$$

*=Message to $$string import="dest"$$ sent on $$date pattern="dd MMMM yyyy, HH:mm:ss" import="date"$$ failed: $$string import="reason"$$. Resend the message to $$string import="dest"$$ once again and maybe you will have luck next time. Sincerely, smsc sme.
$=Сообщение на $$string import="dest"$$ от $$date pattern="dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss" import="date"$$ обломалось: $$string import="reason"$$

section.name: templates
section.param: Hello $$string import="name1" default="world"$$ and $$string import="name2"$$ and all the other people in the world. If you have received this message please resend it to your ten friends and fill yourself happy. Sincerely, mega template.
